Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Southbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Rosemont
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Rosemont due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Rosemont due to debris on the tracks. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#81W West Lawrence

#88 Higgins

O'Hare-bound Blue line service will operate via a single track between Rosemont to O'Hare. 

Please board and exit via Forest Park-bound platform at Rosemont.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
